title: Multiple Items of Electrical Equipment
fullText:
Where more than one item of electrical equipment is supplied from a single separated circuit, separation shall be verified in accordance with Clause 7.4.8.1 and, in addition, by a measurement of the insulation resistance between:
(a) the separated circuit and the equipotential bonding conductor; and
(b) the equipotential bonding conductor and earth; and
(c) the equipotential bonding conductor and any equipotential bonding conductor associated with another separated circuit.
